mapper.select: SELECT sum(imp_count) as imp, sum(imp_success_price_total)/1000 as cost FROM pac_dsp_report WHERE affiliate_id = #{affId} and report_date = #{createDate}

SELECT country, bundle_id as bundle, ad_format as adFormat, ad_width as adWidth, ad_height as adHeight, SUM(imp_count) AS impCount FROM `pac_dsp_report` WHERE report_date >= #{startDate} AND report_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY country, bundle, adFormat, adWidth, adHeight HAVING impCount >= #{size}

SELECT country, bundle_id as bundle, ad_format as adFormat, ad_width as adWidth, ad_height as adHeight, SUM(win_count) / SUM(response_count) AS winRate, SUM(bid_price_total) / SUM(response_count) AS bidPrice, (SUM(win_count) / SUM(response_count)) / (SUM(bid_price_total) / SUM(response_count)) AS k FROM `pac_dsp_report` WHERE report_hour = #{reportHour} GROUP BY country, bundle, adFormat, adWidth, adHeight HAVING winRate IS NOT NULL AND bidPrice IS NOT NULL
